reviewText: I was expecting something totally different, the trailer was a bit misleading....I like Defoe, just not this movie.
Not a happy story.  However I suppose that's the way it was intended.
I'm a big Jess Weixler fan!
Weird and not in a good way

On the positive side:  beautiful locations.  The dancers during the dance sequences were good.  In the negative column: pretty much everything else.  I have watched Willem Dafoe in movies before and found him effective. There was something so unconnected emotionally in the actors.  No life in this movie. I'm not sure how it went wrong, but it went wrong. If that was supposed to be the point, I think it needed to show a contrast to make that point.

It was a bit confusing, though that might be more on me than the film. I'm a big fan of anything with Weixler in it. The timeline was long enough for her character to arc, which she pulled off very well.
Incredibly slow, boring, stilted dialogue.  Couldn't even bear to finish it.
Worst film ever. Godawful acting, Pretentious twaddle devoid of any merit whatsoever. Complete waste of time & $$,
Great movie, but William Dafoe missbehaves nicely.
Lousy story with poorly drawn characters. A waste of time. Not even the Italian scenery was good.
I thought it was boring as hell. I Should have remembered I can't stand Willem Dafoe.
